text: The Royal Shakespeare Company (RSC) is a major British theatre company. It is in Stratford-upon-Avon, Warwickshire, England. The company has over 1,000 staff and makes around 20 productions a year. Most of the plays made by the company are by William Shakespeare.Stanley Wells. Shakespeare for all Time. London, Macmillan, 2002, p. 220. ==References== Category:1879 establishments in England Category:Theatres in the United Kingdom Category:British entertainment companies
title: Royal Shakespeare Company
